title: For all Combat Manoeuvres :
text:
- y A model can only purchase a single Combat Manoeuvre for each Basic Attack .

- y Damage from an attack is resolved before any Combat Manoeuvre is executed.

- y Models with Dual Wield cannot execute the Push Combat Manoeuvre on the second attack each attack action.

Note: Some Combat Manoeuvres generate effects that apply a Token to the target. Duplicate effects cannot be stacked. However, the old effect can be replaced with the new effect when a model is targeted with multiple Combat Manoeuvres of the same type.
